service.name: Spicy vs Sweet
service.description: Spicy vs Sweet is a real-time multiplayer party quiz game inspired by French TV quiz shows. Players join rooms, form teams (Spicy vs Sweet), and compete through 5 chaotic, funny game phases. Questions can be generated by AI using Google Gemini.

core_capabilities.name: Real-time Multiplayer
core_capabilities.description: 2-20 players per room with instant synchronization via Firebase Realtime Database

core_capabilities.name: Team-based Gameplay
core_capabilities.description: Two teams compete: Spicy (red) vs Sweet (pink) in 5 unique game phases

core_capabilities.name: AI-Generated Questions
core_capabilities.description: Custom question generation powered by Google Gemini AI for endless variety

core_capabilities.name: 5 Game Phases
core_capabilities.description: Tenders (Speed MCQ), Sucre Sale (Binary Choice), La Carte (Menu Selection), La Note (Buzzer), Burger Ultime (10-Question Finale)

core_capabilities.name: Food Mascot Avatars
core_capabilities.description: 15 customizable food-themed avatars for player personalization

core_capabilities.name: Solo Arcade Mode
core_capabilities.description: Single-player mode with global leaderboard for practice and competition

game_phases.name: Tenders
game_phases.description: First correct answer wins the point

game_phases.name: Sucre Sale
game_phases.description: Choose A, B, or Both - all players answer

game_phases.name: La Carte
game_phases.description: Team selects menu, answers themed questions

game_phases.name: La Note
game_phases.description: Teams race to buzz and answer

game_phases.name: Burger Ultime
game_phases.description: Answer all questions after hearing them all

technical.database: Firebase Realtime Database (game state) + Firestore (user data)
